title: Gross domestic product ( GDP ) per capita in Romania 2024
yAxis: GDP per capita in U.S. dollars
summary: Overall GDP per capita in U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.

GDP per capita in U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 1995 to 1997, roughly increasing from 1997 to 1998, roughly constant from 1998 to 2001, rapidly increasing from 2001 to 2008, and finally roughly constant from 2008 to 2016.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2006 and 2007.
Maximum GDP per capita in U.S. dollars, about 10385.85 was reported at Year 2008
Minimum GDP per capita in U.S. dollars about 1573.13 was reached at Year 1995
